body.p: To use SNMP, the customer must connect an Ethernet link to the RJ45 header J11 (see ) on the Monitor using a standard Ethernet cable.
For SNMP setup, on the SETUP screen, touch NETWORK/SNMP to display the network parameters for SNMP ().

In addition to the TCP/IP specification, the following must be specified for SNMP: â€¢Specify the Trap Server IP address
Toggle ENABLED/DISABLED for the trap server.
Touch SEND TEST TRAP to verify operation.
Get Community security string for Get operations.
Set Community security string for Set operations.
Touch RESTART WITH NEW SETTINGS if any parameter is changed on this screen. The processor will reboot and search the network for connections.
